text: Ni [mu sheng] shuo:“Yao wo gaosu nimen zai an la nali de huan bao you bi zhe geng huai de ma? Shei zao an la de qianze he qian nu, ta jiu shi tamen zhong de yixie ren bian cheng yuan he zhu, yiji chongbai emo de ren,[fuhuo ri] zhexie ren [zai huo yu li] di diwei shi zui'elie de,[zai chenshi] shi zui yuanli zhengdao de.”
